name: JobSeeker
0:
”Alexa, Open Job Seeker”
”Alexa, Open Job Seeker and fetch my jobs”
”Alexa, Open Job Seeker and give me my preferences”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: job seeker
des: Do you want to know the job openings near by or any place in united states based on the job title, city and state? Then, this skill is apt for you. Job seeker lets users to listen to recent job postings any time of the without having to login to your mobile or laptop. Just set your preferences and open the skill and listen to the latest job openings from major companies almost instantly. This skill is currently applicable for job seekers in USA only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
